fields.name: Category
fields.description: The category of the saved search. This helps the user to find a saved search faster.

fields.name: FunctionAlias
fields.description: The function alias if query serves as a function.

fields.name: FunctionParameters
fields.description: The optional function parameters if query serves as a function. Value should be in the following format: 'param-name1:type1 = default_value1, param-name2:type2 = default_value2'. For more examples and proper syntax please refer to https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/kusto/query/functions/user-defined-functions.

fields.name: Query
fields.description: The query expression for the saved search.

fields.name: Tags
fields.description: The tags attached to the saved search.

fields.name: Version
fields.description: The version number of the query language. The current version is 2 and is the default.
